title: Lemon Chiffon Sponge
ingredients: ['250g cake flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '100g caster sugar', '125ml vegetable oil', '6 egg yolks', '180ml water', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '6 egg whites', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '150g caster sugar', '1 recipe lemon cream filling', '8 lemon slices or grated lemon zest.']
